/~~~~~~~~\
|Pegatron|
\~~~~~~~~/

As Peg was still in the air,his katana out, he only had time to see 
the light of the plasma blasts who were shoted by Megatron and was 
about to dodge but his arm was touched and was ripped off.Then, Peg 
took his arm and yelled in pain. Just when he was adapted to the 
pain, he took himself back "My conditions haven't been respected. 
This challenge is over." he said with determination while going to 
get his arm back.

[Another post by BLack Ben which accidentally went to my inbox.]
